title: Tim Gettys' PS5 Unboxing
description:
Kinda Funny Gamescast host Tim Gettys has his PlayStation 5, so let's get his thoughts on it. The PS5 was provided by PlayStation for review.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys it is finally time me tim gettys i'm gonna get to unbox a playstation 5. i am so excited about this i've never held the duel since this is about to be my very first time with it in my hands i am hoping i love it as much as i think i'm going to uh shout out to playstation for providing this console very very big shout out to you let's get right to it a proper unboxing so here it is we got this nice little play has no limits what is what's it called lenticular i'm loving it already i got to watch everyone else unbox this so i got to see greg i got to see blessing now i get to do it right there next generation of video games in my hand the next generation of playstation been looking at this box so many images of this box for so long on the internet it's heavy it's real heavy i'll tell you that gotta love a good handle you know there we go keeping it simple little classic playstation logo okay we're gonna take the console out [Music] first man it's a big one it's a big one

tell you that gotta love a good handle you know there we go keeping it simple little classic playstation logo okay we're gonna take the console out [Music] first man it's a big one it's a big one everyone this is gonna look so good in this room oh oh yeah what a behemoth of hardware [Laughter] even horizontal this thing is big okay it's definitely going to be very fingerprint prone i'll tell you that is this my favorite design ever absolutely not do i appreciate the commitments to the the stormtrooper look oh yeah very much my aesthetic and then you add the blue light when it's on they were thinking about one tim gettys when they did that i i do very much appreciate that we got the usb c on the front liking that a lot that was something that i was missing from the xbox uh but i will say the the box experience of unboxing the series x many steps above this they the the series x really kind of had a nice like magical moment to it and it felt very well put together this just seems like

the the box experience of unboxing the series x many steps above this they the the series x really kind of had a nice like magical moment to it and it felt very well put together this just seems like stuff in a box which is fine which is fine it's not like the unboxing isn't what it's about but it is part of the experience and oh oh i didn't realize this was like an indent that's not like printed on like i can stick my finger in there see what we got what type of goodies we got going on in here the infinity power cable that i've been talking about love it love it when things use this we got the stand we've got the stand that you'll you'll need to uh to hold this thing uh horizontally and vertically i i've seen so kind of a little interesting mechanism going on there then we got the hdmi cable that does not say ultra high speed on it but rest assured it is ultra high speed you'll be getting all of the thorough put that you need this is this is the big one this is the moment we also got

that does not say ultra high speed on it but rest assured it is ultra high speed you'll be getting all of the thorough put that you need this is this is the big one this is the moment we also got um a a charge cable usb c charge cable for your controller and speaking of the controller this is the dual sense my very first time i gotta say my first hold of this i am not as blown away as i thought i was gonna be the weight's good the d-pad feels real nice the face buttons aren't what i expected but i don't know if that's a good or bad thing they're mushier than i expected now here's the thing i when i hold a controller i always do the tony hawk test is what i call it where i imagine i'm playing tony hawk pro skater 3 if i'm being in particular here where i'd start off in the warehouse level i would go down the left side do the jump do a triple kick flip off the top land in a manual jump and grind on the big rail jump off of that try to get another triple kick flip in manual and then

i would go down the left side do the jump do a triple kick flip off the top land in a manual jump and grind on the big rail jump off of that try to get another triple kick flip in manual and then grind on the side jump up down revert right that start it's like my muscle memory of all that of how it should feel might need to break it in a quick update i do want to say after actually playing a lot with this controller i'm liking it a lot more still have some issues not loving how this feels it feels kind of like an elbow on the bottom but besides that it passed the tony hawk test as you can clearly see here i can't waste any more time i gotta get to to playing this thing to seeing how this actually feels in my hand how it looks all of this oh man the playstation 5 is here i now have the series x and the playstation 5 next generation baby i'm living it but how does the ps5 compare to the moose how does the moose compare to the playstation 5. there we go he's being more cooperative this

x and the playstation 5 next generation baby i'm living it but how does the ps5 compare to the moose how does the moose compare to the playstation 5. there we go he's being more cooperative this time do you like this more are you a sony pony moose are you a sony pony he's taller then you gotta appreciate that but this thing got some half to it which is heavier for the exact same footage damn boy
